text: David Jung-Hsin Lai (; born 3 March 1948) is the sixth and current bishop of the Episcopal Diocese of Taiwan. He was ordained to the diaconate on 23 March 1975, to the priesthood on 11 April 1976, and consecrated on 25 November 2000. == See also == *List of bishops of the Episcopal Church in the United States of America == External links == *House of Bishops begins historic meeting in Taiwan Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Bishops of the Episcopal Church in the United States of America
title: David Jung-Hsin Lai
